text: Leśna ( also Leschney; 1937–1945: Talheim) is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lewin Kłodzki, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately east of Lewin Kłodzki, west of Kłodzko, and south-west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 10. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Leśna, Kłodzko County
